reviews.text: citizenM Paris Gare de Lyon provided excellent basic lodging for us (married couple) who did not intend to spend much time in the hotel room other than to sleep and shower. The room was clean and the bed extremely comfortable. The location, while in a more busy section of Paris, was convenient for taking the Metro either from Gare de Lyon or Gare d'Austerlitz. Surprisingly, the hotel was extremely quiet, considering the amount of traffic outside. It was the most quiet hotel that I have ever stayed in. The staff were friendly and helpful.

Our family of 2 boys stayed in 2 rooms. It worked really well - air con works, bed comfy, clean, tech works, showers good. Small rooms but the Communal spaces are good. In the worse heat of summer this place was a saviour for us! Would recommend to other families but you defo need 1 room per child / parent.

This is a fabulous spot to stay in the 12e arrondisement. Smartly designed rooms; excellent food and drink services; top notch wifi and workspaces; ultra-friendly, multilingual staff. The hotel's proximity to Gare d'Lyon opens many options for train and metro travel, too. Easy to navigate to/from CDG airport. For business travelers: you couldn't pick a better spot in Paris.

An amazing hotel with great facilities, modern and clean. Stayed for one night as needed to be near train station. Rooms were equipped with great facilities, super comfy beds and a fantastic showers. Breakfast area / bar / communal area super stylish. Delicious breakfast! Great friendly staff.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear citizenMalaika,

Thank you for your kind words! We're so happy to hear that you appreciated the facilities - it sounds like you're a perfect fit for our concept, as we aim to provide an XL bed and a power shower to fuel your city adventures! We look forward to welcoming you back to Paris, or to one of our other 36 properties around the globe.

Happy travels!
Warmly, citizenLea

reviews.text: Modern, clean and comfortable tech forward hotel conveniently located next to Gare de Lyon and a short walk from Gare dâAusterlitz. |Close to most Paris attractions and neighborhoods. |Friendly accommodating staff. Very helpful if the techie stuff gets a bit confusing.|Hearty and tasty breakfast buffet. Common lounge areas and workspaces.

I booked 18 rooms for a work trip and we can only say good things! The rooms are super clean, spacious and well thought out. The staff are really friendly and helpful. Location is easy to to and from. Would recommend!
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hi citizenRachel,

Thank you so much for your kind words - we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Wishing you safe travels and hope to see you again soon!

Warmly,
citizenLea

reviews.text: This stay was the first time I'd heard of CitizenM and, as a digital nomad, I'm so glad that I found them. Besides the rooms, staff, and decor being great. They have have a well-equipped co-working area and 24/7 dining at the bar. I bought the membership the same day I arrived once I realized that it fits my needs perfectly. There are a lot of fun and funny touches everywhere if you take a moment to look. I plan to stay at a CitizenM everywhere I go.

I had a fantastic experience at the salon. I got a manicure,,, which was perfect. The salon was clean, the staff were super friendly and my nail tech paid great attention to attention. My nails looked amazing and lasted more than two weeks without any chips. I'll definitely come back and recommend them to others

âââââ Perfect Lounge for Work & Restâ

I spent six hours at the citizenM Gare de Lyon lounge without booking a room, and it was the ideal spot to work, relax, and recharge. Comfortable seating, plenty of charging ports, and a quiet, welcoming atmosphere. Enjoyed nachos with a beer at noon, coffee in the afternoon, and even a quick nap on a couchâshoes off, of course! A perfect oasis in the city for travelers needing a break while waiting for the next train to leave. Highly recommend!
reviews.ownerResponse:
Thank you for your kind words about our facilities. Yes, we certainly do welcome co-working guests with our day pass. Thank you for perfectly describing our vision for coworking - a relaxing and casual environment perfect for getting some work done while sipping on our freshly brewed coffee. If you haven't already, please look into our yearly membership program, mycitizenM+ 

With this generous rewards program, the world becomes your office with access to coworking at most of our global locations. There are also additional perks like food and beverage discounts, 15% off stays, and free late check out. 

Safe travels! citizenChristian

reviews.text: Probably one of the best hotel to visit Paris if you are a tourist. Staff is Amazingly kind and all the little details added make the perfect experience (the umbrella system to lend is pretty clevee). Location is very useful if you take the train : no stress added and you can wait in the lounge part with maximum confort.

I really enjoyed my experience here. The staff was very helpful with check in and would say hello/have a nice day each time Iâd walk through the lobby. The first floor common/bar area is nicely decorated and there is a good water fountain that not only offers ice cold water but sparkling as well.

The rooms are not very spacious but perfect for a solo traveller like myself. The iPad made me think like I was living in the future and I had fun changing up the shower colours.

Location-wise youâre super close to buses, metro and ofcourse the sncf train station. There are also many restaurants, bars, pharmacies and groceries close by.

Donât miss the view from the 16th floor bar + watch out for the doors because they tend to SLAM shut

Definitely worth the price! We had the king room with the gare de Lyon view and it was just the best! We could see part of the Eiffel Tower from the room we were given! The room is pretty high tech with everything in control through an iPad! The staff is also incredibly friendly and helpful with everything you need. Ex: calling a cab / keeping luggage after check out. Will definitely book again whenever I come back to Paris!

This was my second citizenM hotel and it was consistent with my 1st. The configuration is similar, with reception on the 1st floor and checkin being self service.the rooms are comfortable and all controlled by an iPad. In Paris we met more American staff than French and they were super friendly and helpful. We were made very welcome.

To say that my stay at Citizenm has been anything but amazing would be an understatement. I was greeted at arrival by Lavinia, who was beyond kind and friendly and offered great recommendations. Then I made friends with Inka at the rooftop bar and have continued to chat with her every time we see each other. As a solo traveler, their kindness has made my already special trip in Paris even more romantic. <3 10/10 recommend you stay here, please easy to access transit to get anywhere in Paris.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear citizenJoseph,

We are so happy to hear that you had a great time with us! We love moments where we can connect with guests and Lavinia and Inka will be thrilled to hear your kind words about them. We look forward to having the pleasure of hosting you again the next time you are in Paris!

Warmly, citizenLea

reviews.text: We had CD an exceptional stay and would definitely recommend this hotel to o friends when in Paris. Service was great, close to Metro and train lines for easy travel through the city and room size was very comfortable

Everything was great! The hotel is clean, the location is nice and most importantly it is safe, it is easy to reach places to visit. Also, all the staff are very friendly and helpful. I definitely recommend it.

Stayed 3 Nights and unlike other hotels I have stayed & Spoilt like in Dubai ð

Incredible team comprising of Surath & Claudia. Service level is Top Notch

Highly recommend due to team around at the Hotel.

Rooms are small though but Paris doesnât sleep - Isnât ??
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hi Aamir,

We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Claudia and Surath will be delighted to know that they made such an impact on you. Looking forward to welcoming you on a future journey to Paris.

Warmly,
citizenLea

reviews.text: We had an excellent experience at citizenM Paris Gare de Lyon, and a big part of that was thanks to Cristina. Her service was outstandingâalways friendly, attentive, and willing to help with any request. She made us feel welcome from the very first moment and gave us great recommendations for our stay in Paris. Itâs clear that she is passionate about her work and truly cares about the guests. Thank you, Cristina, for making our visit even more special! We will definitely come back.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear Guest,

Your kind words about your experience at citizenM Paris Gare de Lyon are truly heartening to receive. Thank you for sharing this. 

Cristina is definitely a gem of an ambassador and embodies our commitment to exceptional hospitality. It's delightful to know that her recommendations and attentiveness enhanced your Parisian stay. We look forward welcoming you back soon.

CitizenChristian

reviews.text: Super convenient location, able to choose a quiet floor, felt very safe and comfortable, staff very helpful. Would stay here again and at other locations.
Very efficient and modern take on a hotel.  The woman who checked us in was in quite helpful, especially after my wife's passport refused to be scanned properly.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hi citizenRobert, 

We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at citizenM Paris Gare de Lyon! Safe travels, and we hope to have the privilege of welcoming you again soon.

Warmly,
citizenLea

reviews.text:
From start to finish, the level of service and hospitality at this hotel exceeded all expectations. Lea and Harper not only helped us with our booking beforehand but continued to provide outstanding support throughout our stay, making us feel welcome and well-cared-for. The staff as a whole were incredibly friendly, going above and beyond to ensure every detail was perfect, making our experience even more memorable.

The hotelâs amenities were top-notch, blending modern technology with convenience and comfort. The check-in process was seamless with easy-to-use computers, and the in-room tablets provided quick communication with the staff and allowed for complete control of room settings, adding to the overall convenience. The room itself was immaculately clean, spacious, and stylishly designed, offering a perfect blend of relaxation and functionality.

Breakfast was a true highlight, with a wide selection of fresh and delicious options that catered to all tastes. The generous portions and high-quality ingredients left us looking forward to it every morning. I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough; it is an ideal choice for anyone seeking a five-star experience in both service and hospitality.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear citizenCarlos,

Thank you for your kind words about the service and level of hospitality you received during your stay! It was a joy to be able to support you throughout your trip in Paris and we are so excited to be able to welcome you back for a future stay with us. 

Warmly, citizenLea

reviews.text: Very spacious and clean room.  Bed is comfortable and very well made.  Our view is very scenic facing the seine river.  Location is superb-very near train stations.  Breakfast is excellent - heaps of varieties. Free water and free bread to take back in room.  Staff is very helpful.  Seeing them smile all the time makes the hotel welcoming.  The lounge is very cute to hang out.   We felt very safe all throughout our stay.  We were allowed to store our luggage for several hours while we stroll around Paris.  Shout out to Montse and Agnesð

Great place for a touristy visit to Paris. Clean rooms, great breakfast place, amazing service staff providing a personal touch that goes way beyond what you get today. Wish I had noted the names of the staff serving during my stay but everyone working during dec21 and 22, 2024 receives my vote.
Great quirky hotel. Really friendly an accommodating staff.  Fabulous location. Near to lovely restaurants.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hello Rachel!
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We are so glad to see that you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope to welcome you again soon. 
Take care,
citizen Madelaine

reviews.text: Fantastic experience! Being a hotel general manager in Asia myself, itâs not often that Iâm impressed by a hotel, but this hotel is different! Easy self check-in and -out. Great design all around. A room that works with everything in the right place and an app to control everything.  Great bed & shower. A cozy living room/restaurant with nice food. Great location next to the metro/train station. Overall a great experience and well done to the people who designed it and execute on a daily basis. Highly recommended.

What a great hotel right next to Lyon station - I wish all hotels used citizenM concept of checking in, quick easy no forms all automated - this to me makes me want to give it 6 star, rooms are small but comfortable and big enough for a couple, everything easily controlled by an iPad itâs so high tech, I would stay here all the time in Paris when I visit - great staff too
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear Oliver,
Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience!
We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us thanks to the tech, comfortable room and our friendly team!
We hope to welcome you again soon- take care!
citizen Maddy

reviews.text:
What a pleasant surprise! Needing only a 12-hour stay for a flight layover, we selected citizenM for location and price with little regard to other amenities. Upon arrival we found punchy design that emphasizes functionality without sacrificing a fun and artsy feel.

We appreciated a good, quick dinner and breakfast in the lobby that merges a restaurant with comfortable sitting and office work space.

Staff we encountered at self-check-in and restaurant were pleasant and helpful every single time.

The room was small, just barely adequate because the queen-sized bed could only be accessed from one side. And it's good there was office space in the lobby because the room didn't accommodate desk or computer work. This was countered by cleanliness and efficient design that used every square inch, making the key functions of sleeping and bathing easy and comfortable, with perks like push-button controlled shades and lighting.

Overall, we'd return and would recommend citizenM for future stopover stays.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hello Dave, 
Thank you for such a lovely review!
We're thrilled that citizenM turned your quick layover into a memorable experience.
It sounds like our team's hospitality and hotel spaces fit your expectations. We know our rooms are compact, but weâre all about packing in the essentials with a bit of flair.
Hereâs hoping we can welcome you again for a future stopoverâor maybe even a bit longer next time.
Safe travels, 
Noor & The CitizenM Team

reviews.text:
Super nice hotel ð¨ easy checking and Cristina receive with the big smile and explain us how is work the hotel.
Modern hotel the staff was super nice all the time.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear Guest, 

Thank you for sharing these kind words about your experience at our hotel. It's heartening to know that Cristina and our staff could make your stay enjoyable. We strive to deliver modern amenities and warm hospitality to all our guests. Your feedback reaffirms our commitment. We hope to welcome you back soon!

CitizenChristian

reviews.text: Amazing facilities and hotel. Easily my favorite stay in Paris.

Really well located right next to the train with great access to the centre of town. The facilities are great. There is a restaurant and a bar. The staff were really friendly especially Noor, who checked us in and made us a card with a personal message.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear Scott,

It's great to hear about your positive experience at our hotel. Location is indeed crucial and we are glad that you found ours convenient. It's also wonderful to know that our facilities, including the restaurant and bar, met your expectations.

Your kind words about our staff, and especially Noor, have warmed our hearts. It's always a delight to hear that our team could add a personal touch to your stay. 

We look forward to welcoming you back for another delightful experience. Have a great day!

Lea

reviews.text: We visited paris in the month if august and i am soo glad that we got to stay in citizen M with such an amazing staff. It was my brother in lawâs birthday and the entire staff was soo helpful that they helped us in giving supplies like the card, balloons and even the speaker. They kept the restaurant open till 12:30 so that we could celebrate the birthday with eiffel tower view. The rooms and lounge were top notch.  Really thankful to Titi for helping us. You helped us make a memory that we wont forget.

As always, our stay at citizenM was great. There is absolutely nothing to complain about. Above all, the staff are friendlier and more helpful than in any other hotel. Everything is very uncomplicated. The hotel is exceptional in its design. The rooms are beautifully furnished and the location is, as always, excellent. Thank you for a fantastic stay.

We stayed here for our 1st wedding anniversary and enjoyed it a lot. I want to personally thank Claudia for making our stay extra special but also the rest of the staff which was super friendly.
The hotel is located very well with metro & RER nearby and the breakfast is amazing. The room was great and the bed super comfy. Overall a great stay!
A very clean and comfortable room in a great location if you are traveling from gare de Lyon. Go to the sky bar.

Best hotel within this budget. The room are slick and functional, the shared area are well-designed and welcoming. The staff is super helpful and has a great vibe. Citizen M is one of the most popular trendy Hotel branch on the market and this flagship is no exception to it ! Loved my stay with you guys. Thanks a lot.
Guillaume

I stayed at citizenM over the last few days with my grandmother and my family. Upon arrival I was instantly impressed by the level of service provided by each and every one of the hotel staff who made sure that my stay at this location could not have gone better! I'd planned to spend the first nights with my grandmother, an elderly woman, and the hotel staff accomodated her needs excellently going above and beyond for us. Be it ensuring that our rooms where close to eachother, booking restaurants or finding rooms that where suitable for my grandmother they did everything. Absolute superstars! I would especially like to thank the lovely Josephine, Soli and Nour at the reception for their incredible kindness and service. Thank you guys so much you really made my stay. :)

Perfect place to stay at Paris. Near Bercy Siene Bus station where we got on the flixbus!! Rooms were beautiful!! High tech, I personally LOVE IT AND ENJOY THE STAY. Close to at least one amazing restaurant and not very far from the metros and bus station to get anywhere. We made a good decision to stay here all 4 days

I booked this place because it was cheap, had air conditioning and king beds, and was right next to the train station into which we came from Marseille. I didnât expect much but I was blown away with how much I got for my money. A small room, yes, but the comfort, efficiency, technology, cleanliness, art, and proximity to the seine was more than I could have asked for. I will absolutely consider this accommodation chain in the future!

We absolutely loved our time at the Citizen M. I was initially skeptical about the small size of the rooms, but it was perfect for us and our short stay in Paris before heading to the French Riviera. The staff made the experience for us, they were absolutely incredible. At the front desk, Lea was amazing with giving us directions and secret spots to visit (go try the madeleines at Blue Sucre, they were mouthwatering!) and checked back in with us asking how our days were each time we saw her, which was so sweet. At the bar, we loved talking to Christina and the rest of the team!

The hotel is modern and comfortable. The room was a little worn out, and the location wasn't our favorite, a little rough around the edges. But we loved the experience enough to want to try another Citizen M for our next trip!
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hello There, 
Thank you so much for your lovely review, Julia!

We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and that Lea and Christina made such a positive impact. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to them; surely will put a smile on their face :)
We hope your trip to the French Riviera was just as wonderful. 
We look forward to welcoming you back to another CitizenM on your next adventure!

Cheers to beautiful days and exploring new cities.
Noor & The CitizenM Team

reviews.text: Everything is perfect, breakfast is exceptional: especially barista coffee and potatoes. The bed is truly of the highest quality. The only thing is weird light setup in rooms, quiet hard  it to disturb another person in the room if you want to wake up earlier
Great hotel, location and service! Always try and find Citizen M wherever I travel. Top marks for the Citizen M hotel chains.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear guest,

Your kind words are highly appreciated. It's heartening to know that you consistently enjoy your stays with us. We are thrilled to be your preferred choice and we look forward to welcoming you back to any of our Citizen M hotels. 

With kindest regards.

CitizenChristian

reviews.text: Perfect check in and out.Nice cozy place for relax and hang out with friends in their relax area.Wonderful breakfast. Hot and cold and free coffee and tea .Only complain is the bed has only one side climb in .Disadvantage for older people .Overall ,a super nice and friendly hotel.

Staff is amazing, very welcoming and friendly. The breakfast was superb!! Hotel location is great and right beside Gare de Lyon. Room was very small but come on, itâs Paris! Weâll definitely be back.

We stayed at citizenM on our trip to Lyon. The location was perfect as we were catching the train the next day. The rooms are small (the width of the bed). The bed, although comfortable, is located at the end of the room by the window. With two people staying in the room, the person sleeping by the window has to disturb the sleep of the other person if they need to use the toilet in the middle of the night. The door to the toilet/shower compartment was opening inwards hitting the toilet bowl and providing limited space inside. The rooms are quiet and the blinds are useful if early bedtime is needed. The top floor bar, with a view of the city and the Eiffel tower offered a good variety of cocktails and food.

I cannot recommend staying at this hotel more.
First, when we went to the rooftop bar that staff was SO lovely, and the drinks were delicious.
During the night, my boyfriend fell ill and not only did staff call the ambulance for us, but they were so kind and comforting and even handed us a card wishing him well and brought us tea once we returned.
The staff here are so kind, and I will absolutely be staying here again.

1. Perfect location - directly beside metros and buses and trains so all of Paris is accessible from this location.
2. Wonderful staff - so kind and accommodating! Always willing to help and incredibly friendly.
3. Clean rooms - Some of the rooms are larger than others so if you want a large room, get it on the side the views the Giant Clock and NOT the Rue Van Gogh (as those as the smaller rooms)
4. Great Social Spaces - two bars that have excellent drinks. The food isnât great for dinner but breakfast is and there are so many places nearby for food.

Great hotel for business travellers or tech friendly travellers. Firstly location is at a prime spot, which will help you explore the city; either walk, tram or metro or even by cruise. Secondly, hotel staff are so friendly and theyâre your go to people for everything in the city.

Next hotel rooms are so tech friendly and innovative I must say, they have an iPad which controls all your needs - TV, Lights, music and mood. And then you have a spacious bar on top and restaurant at the entrance along with co working area. You canât expect more for a working traveler.

Loved this stay. Only request is a better view. Which was sad for me at least.

Outstanding service and a prime location. The staff were extremely helpful, assisting with all inquiries and providing useful tips. The room was beautifully decorated, and the location was absolutely ideal.
kind staff, clean + modern rooms, and generally quiet
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hi citizenHailey,

Thank you for your review and for your kind words about our ambassadors! We are happy to hear you enjoyed the connectivity of our rooms and the calm. We hope to be able to welcome you back during a future stay in Paris!

Safe travels, citizenLea

reviews.text: Our go to hotel whenever in Paris. Far enough from all the tourist attractions to have cheaper rates but right next to the train station that gives you easy access to anywhere in Paris. Rooms are small but clean, quiet, and pretty high above the traffic.

Our 30th anniversary has become memorable waking up to looking at the Effel tower because Danielle who greeted us first time kindly offered a room with a with a view.  Rooftop is worth visiting and there is direct passage to get to the station without going out to street. Very convenient place with pharmacy and bakery near.  Even though room is compact it has all basic needs with refrigerator and safe. Excellent shower, and bedding was comfy.

CitizenM's are a little different to your normal hotels. With bright colours and funky decor it's quite a refreshing look.

The rooms have enough space for a couple to sleep comfortably, if you want more room the large lounge and bar areas give you plenty of space to stretch out or eat some food. For those who smoke, there is an outdoor space on the dining floor where you can go outside without having to go all the way down to the street. From the top floor bar you can look along the Seine and see the Eiffel Tower in the distance.

All in all I would look to use this or any CitizenM in the future if they are all like this.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hello citizenAndy,

Your detailed observations and kind words are truly appreciated. CitizenM strives to offer a unique and refreshing experience to all our guests, and it's delightful to hear that you enjoyed the bright colors, funky dÃ©cor, and the ample space in our lounge and bar areas - it seems like you are a perfect fit for our concept!

The view of the Eiffel Tower from our top floor bar is indeed a sight to behold and we're glad you got to experience it. We are looking forward to welcoming you back on your future visits, and we hope that every CitizenM you visit will continue to meet your expectations!

Safe travels,

citizenLea

reviews.text: We had lovely stay this weekend . Reception and bars Staff are friendly. They also give us information about some famous landmark in Paris. The room is perfect, clean, smell lovely, modern and it has everything we need. Love the rooftop bar we get to see the Eiffel tower sparkle at night. Defenitly will choose this hotel again when we visit paris next time .

A great location, quiet area and a short walking distance to the interchange of railways and metros. Centralised location which make it easy for traveller like me with an active itinerary to go around Paris. The view from hotel room was fantastic that I can view the nearby canal and Eiffel Tower can be seen too. The staff service was great. The room was spacious with comfortable double bed. I love the smart controller using mini ipad to control the lighting, blind, curtain and TV. There is a nice bakery shop at the corner for quick bites especially for breakfast. Overall, convenient location and safe. Will come back to stay here again for my next visit.
Great hotel for staying a night. Clean rooms, comfortable beds and great staff. Canât beat the location for jumping on a quick train out of Paris, too.

Good value for Paris but not cheap. Pleasant, friendly atmosphere with lots of areas to relax. Food and drinks reasonably priced. Rooms are standardised and tiny, the same as CDG airport Citizen M. Bed is large, wide and comfortable but not too long. ( No problem for me @1,73m.). Not much room for 2 suitcases.
Good location next to Gare de Lyon and very near the Seine. Patisserie/boulangerie on the corner nearby.

First of all, I would like to emphasize the beautifully designed interior of the hotel, which with numerous aesthetic details provides the guest with a superior atmosphere of the stay. The stay at the hotel began with a futuristic check-in procedure, and the beautifully designed smart room with ambient light impressed me greatly and provided a great holiday. The cleanliness of the rooms and interior was at a high level. I especially liked the rooftop bar with the very friendly staff. Great location! High recommendation!

We made friends with the bartender Soli while staying at the hotel for the better part of a week. She is SO amazing and made our visit fantastic. Soli was friendly, made us delicious cocktails the entire time, including a custom one during an evening when we were sitting in the upper floor bar looking out the window at the lit-up Eiffel tower. Honestly wish we could stay longer!

The rest of the hotel is solid as well, especially the cafe/restaurant. My only complaint is that the room doesn't have a ton of storage so I wasn't able to unpack my clothes for our longer stay.

Room
The room was clean, well presented and requiring no updates. The Ipad controls the TV, climate and other things. There were plenty of sockets and my room had UK, US in addition to Eu. There is a small fridge in the room which can hold drinks and food. The shower was delightful with a smooth temperature control and powerful pressure. There is an not an iron in the room but there are ironing rooms situated on a few floors. I found the one on the 8th floor easily and it was clean and everything worked well.

Service
On arrival I was greeted with smiles and my check in was very smooth. My queries were answered comprehensively and professionally. Special thank you to Kristine who provided me with a list of vegan places to eat. Throughout my stay all staff were friendly. There was a good range of breakfast available and vegan options were available. The food was good and the coffee was strong. There are business and lounge areas which are ideal for chilling and or working.

Location
Ideally located for the traveller as it is moments from the Rue de Bercy exit of Gare du Lyon. The surrounding area felt safe even at 2am on a Saturday morning. I would visit again.

Loved staying here for four days while visiting Paris. The bar scene inside of citizenM is amazing & the staff is super friendly and welcoming! The area is a bit sketch at night â and a bit during the day. Highly recommend but be aware of surroundings in this area! Also, not many good restaurants/cafes nearby.

I had a fantastic time at the citizenM! The staff was super friendly/helpful and the room was the perfect size for me (solo traveler). I liked how everything in the room was automated and easily controlled with the provided iPad. I also highly recommend the breakfast as it was delicious and reasonably priced. If you donât have a travel power adapter they can provide one at the reception desk. I had to do this and ended up liking it so much I bought one!
I only came here to make use of the coworking space but it's a really cool vibe with lots of interesting decor. Lavinia on reception was an absolute star and a credit to the hotel!
Great hotel with beautiful rooms and great location.

Great hotel in a good location. Room was small but very stylish and quiet. The staff at the hotel are very friendly! The food is good and the coffee and wine bar is a pleasure to sit at. Would recommend it in a heartbeat and would stay here again in the future.

First time staying at a citizenM property was a success. Very easy hotel to navigate with friendly staff. Rooms are similar to cruise ship rooms but that is transparent when booking. If you utilize a hotel as a home base for your travel and donât spend that much time in the room than this is perfect for you. Beds are extremely comfortable. Great location to hop on the train at Gare de Lyon. If I visit Paris again I would not hesitate to stay here again.

The staff is really friendly, Iâd like to say specially thank you to Jenya who was there at breakfast time! Generally speaking about the hotel, itâs not the newest one among the Citizen M-s, but the rooms are quite decent for their price (remember, itâs Paris)!ð

- Great for remote workers - Very fast Wi-Fi, very spacious common areas with desks and couches, as well as conference rooms for 10 people.
- Excellent location either. right by Gare De Lyon,
- Stylish, modern-art design of the foyer and bright, well-lit rooms. Very comfortable beds to sleep, ideally for 2 people who are comfortable with each other as the sinks are in the room.
- Would book again with my eyes closed.
- Windows cannot be opened - could be an issue if you are someone who prefers fresh air
Clean, modern, love the ambience in the room, nice restaurant and bar. Good access to various buses and metro. Only thing that would make it better is a fitness room/pool/hot tub. Would stay again

This hotel is fantastic for an individual or a couple. The bed is super comfy, the vibe with the lights is sweet and Gare de Lyon is a nice transit location to pretty much everywhere in Paris within 30 minutes to an hour.

Prices for the rooms are decent (not amazing) and the view from the top floor gives a nice overview of the city with the Eiffel tower in the far distance.

Staff are super friendly and the whole setup is very hipster and youthful; it's not your average hotel room as the room is a bit more compact and studio like but its great for students or those with young souls.

I can't say enough good things about this hotel or the staff! Self-check-in is fast and super easy, and the room was ready early and was clean. The hotel staff is amazing - super kind and welcoming! Which was great for someone who just moved to France in the middle of the pandemic. Everyone I spoke to was just wonderful. Breakfast was good (albeit smaller than when I stayed at a CitizenM in non-pandemic times) and the dinner was good as well and fairly decently priced. Would definitely stay again!

I love this hotel
1st time to Paris/France& this hotel & its staff made it marvelous!
Funky, hospitable, kind, centrally located, good food, reasonably priced
Good breakfast!!!!
Very kind staff, multi-cultural & young, great suggestions
Yes rooms are small for dads/daughters, so x2 rooms are good suggestionsâ¦it has the European size limits to Americans, but AWESOME!!
Great concept, great service, great funky messaging & great food & drink!!!!
Hannah, Kristina, Noor, mathias, Everyone was great!!
Front desk let is check early (or arriving day from USA) BIG DEAL!
And the staff was awesome fir directions in France!

Great location right next to the train station with the metro and RER. Mostly for business travellers that need to get in and out with little fuss. Rooms are small with just enough space for your basic needs and can be controlled through the app.

Go to the top floor bar and watch the Eiffel Tower sparkle at night.

Room size is good enough for 1 person.  Small for 2, unless youâre only using the room to sleep in.  The room is controlled via an ipadâlights, curtains, thermostat, tv etc. which is very convenient as you can do all that while in bed.  Thereâs a co-working space at the lobby for those who brought work with them, though thereâs also a small desk in the room.  Breakfast was decent.  Hotelâs location is relatively far from the main attractions, but thereâs a nearby train station (plus getting an uber was pretty easy which we did a lot of), so it wasnât a problem

The hotel staff are super friendly and helpful with the self check-in process. Love that the technology has allowed the hotel staff to focus on providing a better guest experience.

The room is super cozy and clean with everything laid out very efficiently. They don't provide some of the disposable amenities but that's not an issue for me, just be sure to bring your own. They do provide shampoo/bodywash and liquid handsoap.

The shower has great water pressure and doesn't run out of hot water. Super essential during winter!

I stayed here with my wife in early Feb 23, for three nights. The hotel is very close to Gare du Lyon and the Seine. Our room was compact but very comfortable with a big bed, good temperature and a great shower. What stands out about CitizenM is the staff and the vibe, they were so friendly and the bar/dining area and the adjacent rooms were very relaxed and enjoyable spaces to spend time in. I will definitely stay here again if I return to Paris.

This hotel was an incredible find!  It's a very high-tech hotel with self-check in with kiosks in the lobby and a  lot of cool gadgetry in the rooms themselves.  Pretty much everything in the room was controlled with a tablet (blinds, dimming lights, music, alarm, tv, temperature control, etc.) and there was some cool features like being able to cast your personal devices onto the TV if you're so inclined to watch something as you go to bed.  If you're afraid of not having a person, don't despair as there were people ready to help out in the lobby area if you struggle.  Most importantly, the room and bed were both HUGE in comparison to most European hotel rooms.  Bathroom was a good size too.

The bar on the top floor was also really great, with a very nice view of the city including the Eiffel tower light show.  It was nice to sit up there in the lounge area of the bar, have a drink, and watch the city.

Finally, the prices were pretty reasonable considering how much Paris can be.  I spent more on my hotel last year and it wasn't nearly as nice.  The only downside is it's a little far from a lot of attractions, but I like to walk anyways.  I will definitely stay here again next time I visit

My first time at CitizenM.  I am a big fan.  They have a really good understanding of what the customer needs and deliver it efficiently and with style.  Lots of welcoming, funky public space.  Small, but well designed bedrooms - efficient use of space, comfortable, fun design, controllable lights and blinds and with connectable media.  The Aircon was even good and gentle  (I normally hate Aircon!)
One downside is that one person has to climb over the other one to get out of bed.  The other is foam pilllows and duvets making for a hotter bed than ideal and less comfortable neck.  Other than that, pretty much perfect.

Excellent Hotel! An amazing service and staff (especially Henoch who was extremely nice and very helpful). We were 4 and ordered 2 rooms that were very clean and has all the facilities needed. Very recommended - we will definitely be back next visitðªð¼ðð¼
Super team and great hotel with nice location and amenities

Perfect place for a short stay and solo travel.
Staff are all super friendly and helpful.
Rooms are well equipped - only thing missing for me would be a Nespresso/ coffee maker.
The technology used makes your stay hassle free and all controlled by your phone or the in room
IPad, and avoids long waits at checkin and checkout - something major hotel chains should learn from.
Breakfast is decent with mostly good quality products, although fairly limited in selection, the price is very fair.
I lucked out with a room on top floor with an amazing view riverfront view of Paris you will not even get a most 5 star hotels in the city.

Definitely among the best Hotels I have stayed at so far.  Great hospitality from the entire staff. Everytime I went to the cafe to get some milk for our daughter, they gave immediate preference and attention. The cafe staff are amazing ð . The rooms are smart and ultra modern (although on the smaller side by US standards) . I would definitely rate this 10/10 or 5/5 any metric you want. Kudos to the staff (The best).
Great, modern rooms - very small but designed well. All room amenities can run off iPad - lights, music. Bed was comfortable. Large, public areas to hang out in.

Wonderful experience. Their staff is super friendly and well informed. Travelled in January 2021 when restaurants and  museums were closed in Paris. The staff provided up to date information, where super friendly and welcoming. Exactly what I need after a long trip. On top of that the hotel is super beautiful and the technology is the best one. It works beautifully.

I'm a huge fan of CitizenM hotels. The rooms, service, and general ambiance typically are great and show a lot of attention to detail. Our stay at the Gare de Lyon location exceeded my expectations.

Like the name says, this hotel is right by the Gare de Lyon train station. It provides a convenient point to hop on a train and get where you need to go in a short amount of time. We were able to get to most of the normal tourist spots in about 20 minutes or less from there. There are also some good spots nearby as well, like a pharmacy and some eateries.

The room was comfortable and clean. We had a decent view from up where we were. It was also quiet outside of some light traffic noise.

Servicewise, I had an excellent experience with some of the friendliest hotel staff you could meet. Henock, Ron, Blessing, and everyone else there went above and beyond for us. I hope to see them all again the next time I'm in Paris.

The entire staff, but especially Mercy, was awesome!  They understood and got for us everything we needed.   The room was also great even if it was small!   Loved the layout of the room too!   The best place weâve stayed in all France!
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hi Citizen Mary Ann,

Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We are happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay! We will also make sure we tell Mercy about how much you loved your stay!
We hope we will get to see you again very soon in the future.
Have safe travels,
CitizenM team.

reviews.text: Small hotel rooms, but very gorgeous breakfasts, recommended, near to Gare de Lion station where near, very convenient to move around the city
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hi there,
Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback! We appreciate the opportunity to learn from your experience and we are intent on improving for your future experiences. 
We are happy that you enjoyed our super breakfast as well as our very central location with a lot of public transports available within a 5 minutes walk.
We understand that our bedrooms may be smaller in comparison with other hotels though we have designed them to ensure the necessities are there. A giant XL bed, powerful rain shower and working desk. With that in mind we also designed our great living room space, filled with great Vitra furniture for our guests to come and relax with us whilst they enjoy a bite to eat and/or a well deserved drink whilst being able to plug in their laptops and work away.
We'd like to add that we listen to your feedback and we constantly review the designs of our rooms to meet modern travellers' expectations. While our existing hotels remain as they are, our new and future rooms may look different. 
Safe travels,
citizenM Paris Gare de Lyon

reviews.text:
Very nice hotel . I got my room booked at 12 floor and view was amazing. Although my room was a bit small but it is good for singles .
Definitely hotel must have rooms of all sizes .
Special things I liked most about this hotel is everything is automated right from check-in to hotel to check-out.
Room facilities like TV , lights windows curtains everything is controlled by a tablet in the room . Itâs great .
Hotel is in good location near to Metro and RER .
Hotels staffs are good and well behaved and groomed .
Breakfast is good and healthy too .
I had a great experience staying there .

Fun, funky hotel! We checked-in for our 4 night stay on my birthday and were treated to complimentary drinks in the bar! Nice touch. Check-in personnel were very helpful with questions. Bit of a walk to attractions, but it's right by two train stations.

The first good impression is at the very first moment one gets inside. All the smiling faces at the reception greeting you after the long trip. The whole ambience is spectacular. The rooms as everything else in the hotel is clean and really stylish. The hotel personnel is really helpful in many ways. It is a great pleasure for a guest to see adequate people who enjoy their job and more importantly they are always interested about how a guest feels himself not only in the hotel but also how is his visit in Paris. What was for me even more fascinating was how many different charity initiatives have these people. One last truly stunning and important thing : All these well behaved, polite professionals speak amazingly good English.
reviews.ownerResponse: Hi George Alexander! Wow thank you for the lovely review especially about our staff! We have shared you kind words with them. Hopefully we can welcome you back soon, until then safe travels, citizenM team

reviews.text:
Just, amazingly perfect.

This is my third time at a CitizenM, but I'd almost forgotten how much I love their hotels. Arrived at Paris Gare de Lyon and the staff were waiting by the lift to help us check in.

We opted for the Landmark View when booking (since staying for a full week) - and it wasn't a disappointment, lovely view of the Tour Eiffel at night twinkling, and a big corner room. The cleaning each day was thorough - and we felt like we returned to a new room every night. Zero travel concerns whilst staying here, and (rightly) strict on their mask policy.

Throughout the whole stay we felt at home and had lovely staff greeting us every morning and evening. Literally nothing to change.

My partner and I stayed here for the first night back in Paris. Weâd never come across CitizenM hotels before and I loved the innovative Self-Check In system, itâs very easy to follow and parts are exactly the same as the Airport (Scanning ID documents).
We were greeted on arrival by Citizens Greg, he was fantastic in walking us through our Check-In, the iPad Room Control System and made sure we were aware to grab our free bottles of water from the Bar, before heading to our room.
Our room was fantastic! The bed was so big (King) and comfortable with extra pillows in the drawer under the bed. They make great use of space with the basin in the main room, freeing up the bathroom to be used simultaneously, the amazing shower (with a choice of Rainfall or Jet Spray) was spacious and great water pressure that is unaffected by turning the basin tap on. I loved that we could not only dim the lights, but change the colour. The electric curtain and Block Out Blind, also controlled by the iPad, was fantastic and blocked out the Sun so well, when my partner woke me, I had no idea it was 8am.
The room is silent, considering the building is so close to the Pont Charles de Gaulle (bridge - for non-French speaking people) and on the corner of two busy streets.
Check-Out was equally easy, just selecting Check-Out and placing the room keycard onto the sensor.
I would definitely recommend it and Iâd definitely stay here again. We need a Citizen M chain in Australia.

Handy location very modern and comfy.  Worth a stay over if in the area. Close to major  train station so access to all of Paris.   Breakfast tasty with lots of choice.  Friendly sociable bar.  Did not have Di net but many did.  Rooms high spec and electric enjoy...

We had never stayed at a CitizenM before, but for our honeymoon in Paris we decided to give it a go. We couldn't have been happier we did. The room was awesome... incredibly comfy bed, free movies, smart layout. We also loved that the Canteen was open 24/7 and that they had computers available for use in the lobby. Check in/out was a breeze. Location is amazing. Paul downstairs has great, cheap pastries. The metro is just a few steps away. My only complaint (and it's a little one) was that there is no conditioner or soap/body wash provided, so be sure to bring your own!

I stayed here for a business trip, booked for me. So was not expecting the amazing experience that is citizenM - from the checking in and out) being met by very friendly and inviting staff.. to the fantastically integrated rooms and the amazing attention to detail. I will definitely be joining the citizenM club and seek out their spots for the future.

We are very happy about our stay. The room was tidy and comfortable, and we really like the fact we can use ipad to remote control all the functions in our room. The top floor bar is great bonus and you may enjoy the nice view from 6pm. The bar staff at the first floor was also very pleasant, Danielson especially, who provided a great attention to us. Highly recommended, and we will come back again
Nasib and cristina was super welcomed  and all the staff super good i love citizenm
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear citizenOmar,

Thank you for your kind words about the team! We are happy Cristina and Nassib made such an impression on you and are excited to welcome you back in the future!

Warmly,
citizenLea

reviews.text: We like the Citizenm chain as weâve stayed at a London location twice; itâs fun, the food is good, bars are well stocked, and the rooms are clean, bright and have wonderfully comfy beds. This particular hotel has all of those things; we ate from the kitchen regularly and were always satisfied, and really liked being next to a main train station. We slept well and enjoyed the room overall. Weâve stayed at this chain before so we know the rooms are small, the bathrooms arenât really away and private, but we donât care. Stay here and get to know your partner on a whole new level; good for the relationship right? Staff was always welcoming. House keeping was a little hit and miss, but thatâs not a big deal to us. Paris has a lot going on and it was always nice to return to our little nook and snuggle up; enjoy!

This place is beyond any hotel that I have ever been too.
The bed is so comfy the decoration is cozy, modern and feels like home.
I love the customizable room features.
The staff is so friendly and smiling.
We will definitely look for Citizen M hotels anywhere we go
reviews.ownerResponse: Hi there, what an amazing review - it makes our heart skip a beat :) We pride ourselves to have reinvented hospitality and offer a different kind of experience to our guests, so reading your feedback makes us believe we are achieving this. Our ambassadors will be happy to see you return to your home away from home. Don't wait too long though :), citizenAlina

reviews.text: Cool joint! Modern, clean, and funky in a cool way. Rooms are small but have all you need. Fully smart controls for lights, blinds, TV, AC amount other stuff controlled via iPad. The rooftop bar on level 16 is sweet, that alone is worth it. Awesome views across to the Eiffel Tower to watch the sunset. Downstairs lobby is nice too.

We stayed 3 nights at this nice hotel. Great location, good walk along the river, easy transportation to the airport. Very nice view from the window on the river, and we also could see Eifel Tower at the evenings, mornings. Very professional front desk, friendly staff, great breakfast. Spacious lobby, cafeteria, modern design. Amazing view from the 16 floor. There is not enough space however inside of the room, especially bathroom area. Nevertheless, our stay was really amazing.

Very beautiful high tech design hotel with all the luxury you need. As an interior designer I fell in love with the interior. So many fun details (signs, carpeting and moving lamps in reception hall). The staff was very polite and helpful. The room was very clean and fully equipped. Itâs fun to operate everything with the tablet (lights, sunscreens, tv). I would definitely visit a CitizenM again.

Perfect for an overnight stay if you need to be close to the gare de Lyon. Bed was so comfortable and the room had been kitted out with loads of cool little smart features, light controls etc. We ordered from the restaurant and the food was delicious as well. We were really pleasantly surprised with this place, which is also doing a great job of implementing safe covid protocols. Would recommend.
reviews.ownerResponse: Hi Alex Foley, Thank you for your review. We are happy to read that you were pleasantly surprised by your stay and hope that we can welcome you back again with us soon! Until then, safe travels citizen Dagmar

reviews.text: Upon arriving I was greeted by Emma, hotel representative, everything was outlined, a free drink. Emma was awesome! Free WIFI, near Train station, clean, space used wisely, quiet rooms, fast elevators, great food.

Very friendly and helpful staff, and the connectivity within the rooms (streaming from personal devices to the room TV) was very unique and useful. Did I mention the helpful staff? They've done just a fantastic job of taking care of us. One last thing: there was a (5-day) delay with the airline getting us our bags, so when the bags finally arrived the hotel even MADE A SIGN CELEBRATING THE ARRIVAL OF OUR BAGS. Such friendly, helpful people!!

If you seek perfection - this is it.. The hotel is just next level!  The interior and exterior designs are out of this world! It combines comfort with technology, innovations with style... just amazing ! â¤ï¸ And the service is super nice. Absolutely recommend!

Very modern and high tech. Everything can be controlled by a mini iPad, including the lighting colour in the shower! Self check-in, but there are staff to help. We had a lovely view of the station (Gare de Lyon) and out over Paris. Room was spotless and the bed was huge and ultra comfy.

Free Wifi, Self-Check-In/Out, Smart Rooms with moodlights and super comfy beds! Great location next to the train station and lots of restaurants just a short walk away. Staff was very friendly too. We couldn't have been happier with our choice. â¤

Just be aware that the rooms are rather narrow and the slightly transparent bathroom is right there in the middle, but there's a curtain if you need one.
Amazing stay! Very kind staffs (check-in, housekeeping, bar etc literally everyone is soooo nice) They made my birthday very special! Good view along la seine to Eiffel towel is a big plusâ¥ï¸

Excellent value for money and will definitely return!

Pros:
- very convenient location, only a couple of mins away from Gare de Lyon with easy direct access right next to the hotel
- beautiful interiors
- very clean
-  check in and check out relatively smooth processes
- comfy bed
- friendly gesture from the hotel for my birthday celebration

Cons:
- they push using app but the CX is not very intuitive yet. It was difficult to reach someone to communicate a last minute change in check-in but eventually it was resolved relatively promptly via their Whatsapp help line
- would be great to add small kettles + tea in the rooms

my stay was excellent, efficient clean great location.  The service was above and beyond especially from my man Andrew, wanted to give him a special shout out for helping me after a rough day and not only giving me a great list of recommendations around the area but a firm handshake and a free drink ticket which meant the world.  Would recommend to a friend, a coworker, & family, cheers

This has been one of the best hotels I've ever been and it is right next to the Gare de Lyon, which is ideal for travelers. Great hospitality, super friendly staff and good good. It almost seems that everything is possible here. Checking in a bit earlier? No problem. Do you want a late checkout? Also not a problem. There is a bar on the roof where you can sit at the window and you have a great view over Paris and its Eiffel Tower.

The rooms are on the small side but they have everything you need and have a very modern and light interiour. Everything is controllable by a pad and you can find a decent safe under the bed.

When I return to Paris, I will return here again. Thanks for the wonderful stay!

Rooms are spacious compared to standards in Paris and food is deliciousâ¦and the tech is there - amazing and incredible. This is definitely the kind of service that Iâm looking for, guest-oriented with a little funny twist to it. I love it!
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hello citizen Paulina,

Thanks for the feedback. We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us and we can't wait to welcome you soon in  our living rooms again.

Until we see you again soon, have safe travels!!

CitizenM Team.

reviews.text: Modern and stylish design. Rooms are cosy. Perfect for short work trips. The bar at the top floor offers exquisite cocktails. Downstairs is plenty of space for relaxing after work or before you off to the airport. I will surely be back.

The views from this hotel are absolutely stunning, definitely worth the price. Check in was easy, breakfast was delicious and the staff are so friendly (and also speak good English!) Thoroughly enjoyed my stay, will be back in the future.

Staff very friendly and they speak english! Good location if you are arriving on Gare Du Nord. Metro and Bus station in front of hotel that connects you directly everywhere! Rooms are very modern!

No cash.

Ask for room 1510, you can see Eiffel Tower from your bedð«¶ð½

Awesome hotel. One of the best beds in which I have ever been. Everything can be control with a iPad from the room (regulate temperature, lights, curtains...). To complete all that the shower is also the best shower I have ever seen , big and really comfortable . Totally recommended if you want to visit Paris for a few days.

Lovely hotel right next to the Seine. The check in is set up as a DIY but there is always hotel staff present to help you check in. The interior design is very modern cosy. The rooms are clean, comfortable and well maintained. If you get the room with a view you will see the Eiffel Tower and the Notre Dame cathedral when you look outside. Breakfast was good and complete. You can have dinner there as well and the prices are reasonable.

Beautiful modern and stylish hotel located in the heart of Paris. White, red and black are the colors of most things in the room. The rooms are small but high quality. Technology is apparent everywhere. and the impact of this technology is a very interactive and involving experience.

Modern hi-tech design, great style, beautiful room decor, nice location and very friendly staff. We loved everything about staying in this hotel. Oh, and great prices as well!
And I felt in love with stylish photos on the walls of the room and in restaurant!

reat central hotel to explore all of Paris. Check in is strictly 2pm so no early check in by staff were super professional and held our luggage for us. And helped us through the check in electronic process. The rooms were surprisingly roomy with lovely big windows and a view. The bed was probably the best I slept in France. Great technological additions like the ability to cast to the tv. Fast wifi, and cool under bed safe. I liked that this hotel felt ultra modern and wouldn't feel out of place in Tokyo. It was a great change to a lot of musty old French hotels. Location is also unbeatable, just a minutes walk from Gare de Lyon, the area is also great for restaurants, and the scenic walks by the river is beautiful. Breakfast was affordable but also delicious with the best coffee and worth it. I recommend this hotel enough and would stay again in a heartbeat.

A hotel done right, super techy from check-in all the way to the point where you can have mood lighting for your shower!

Super clean and comfy room and the staff were really helpful. Had a beef Ragu from the kitchen and was incredibly nice, far exceeding other hotels' food offerings.

Will definitely stay here again on my next visit to Paris!

This hotel is the best in Paris! It has a superb location and excellent service! I love to give a shout out to Mercy who served us with a smile and gave us a room upgrade. Will definitely come back here when in Paris!

Great customer service. Very prompt.
I loved the room.
The one downer was that you could only pay at the bar using a card as they don't accept cash.

My cousin and his girlfriend stay here. Very nice location. Wont be disappointed. You located by al llm the transportation you'll need. Train, bus, uber and subway. The river which a few different shuttle boat are on is right there. Bakeries and food spots. Theirs a couple bars in the hotel one over looking the river, and I think there is effile tower view. The rooms are all you need spacious enough. I thought it was cool that you could change the mood of your room with a controller. You could go disco, with hopping light and music or romantic. The controller also controller brings tv and I think the airflow. The bathroom is not as private, as its frosted glass doors and well that's about it. But seriously it work, it just depends on who your with.

We booked this because itâs near Gare de Lyon. Checkin is self checkin and thereâs a receptionist always there to help. The process was seamless. The room is very clean and comfortable, shower is great. Thank you.

Extremely comfortable bed. Room is quite small but sufficient. Itâs brightly lit. Breakfast and coffee are very nice. Helpful and friendly staff. Nice dining and co-working area. Would suit people who need space to work for business trips.
Close to Gare du Lyon so well connected with RER, Metro and buses. I would recommend this place.

Outstanding hotel super close to the Gare de Lyon. The check-in and rooms are all controlled through smart technology and offers a comfortable stay in the heart of Paris for a reasonable price.
There are multiple cozy and relaxing lounge areas including a rooftop bar and working desks to catch up on emails with a glass of wine.
CitizenM does not disappoint with very friendly staff who are more than happy to help in both French and English.
Make sure you checkout all that is available at this fantastic hotel next time you are visiting Paris.

A great hotel in the center of Paris on Garde Lion station. The hotel has a modern design, all is activated with an iPad. The room is quite small but perfectly designed. Breakfast is excellent. Highly recommend for singles or couples. The hotel has a pub on the top 16 floor with a great view of the city.

It was perfect. Big shout out to Andrew, at the front desk, and David, at the bar upstairs. Great location just outside of the train station. Just across the bridge if you want to go to a disco at night. Placed along the river to start your walk towards Champ ElyÃ©es. CitizenM, was clean and modernized, with up to date tech for service. I just couldnât get my  iPhone to mirror or chromecast on to the tv to play music, YouTube, or watch a movie from my phone, but I was never in my room. I had an nice view of the Tour Effiel from my room. You just have to experience here for yourself.

for young people its a perfect base to charge from all day. neat compact smart room with insane beds, perfect place to bring potential date. has great starting places to eat and drink, very central to get to many places. looking forward to test more citizenM in other cities. Probably the same, which means excellent (for young! single, friends and couples. not for families. maybe for brief business visits too?)

Love this hotel, the rooms are small but cosy, for me they are just perfect, I don't care about having a huge room as long as I have everything I need, I actually like how the bed is against the wall, makes it super cosy and it's soo comfy!

Everything is done through the iPad which at times can be a little slow or glitchy, but nice to have that control from the side of your bed. The shower is lovely, several settings and mood lighting to make it just right!

Food and drink is a little expensive, but really nice new and exciting brands, that I don't mind spending the extra on trying!

All the staff are friendly and super smiley, I didn't need to use it but being able to get food 24 hours is a nice touch too.

A fantastic hotel! The staff were friendly and very helpful. The rooms were small but all the space was used to itâs maximum to make the room feel comfortable. Everything is controlled by the in room iPad which was easy to use. The hotel is located next to gar de Lyon and the 87 buss takes you to the Eifel tower with the opportunity to jump off to get to Notre Dame too! 100% will use this hotel in the future. The only downside I found was that the breakfast was a limited choice and not really worth the money. my day in Paris was made 100% better thanks to this hotel.

Love the citizenM hotels. The location is very practical for stays in east of Paris. With quick access to subway it gets you to most of Paris within about 20-30 minutes. There is a bar on the top floor that isn't known about a lot. It has an amazing view of Paris (one of the best). Unique view over the river and incredible for sunsets. Rooms aren't all the same (unlike other citizenM's) so pro tip: ask on check-in.

Went to many hotels in France this summer and the one the kids liked most was citizenM in Paris. Although rooms and bathroom is small they present so many nice details, that it is a very good and not expensive choice in Paris center.

After arriving in an absolutely awful AirBnB in Paris late at night and after a lot of unnecessary stress, thanks to my boyfriend we managed to get a room in citizenM Paris - Gare de Lyon. The hotel is simply beautiful and very modern. Before we arrived I felt like I could have cried but when we arrived at citizenM I felt I couldnât have been more lucky. We arrived at the hotel quite late at night and the staff were all lovely and accommodating and very understanding of our situation. Our hotel room was lovely qnd kept up with the modern theme of the hotel. Due to the fact we got there so late at night we decided to have some food in the restaurant at the hotel which was just lovely. We had a really comfortable first night in the hotel, the bed was luxuriously comfy and the bed linen was of a high quality. When we arrived back to the hotel after our first day exploring Paris there was a drinks voucher waiting for us in our room from the hotel due to the poor experience and stress we had had with the Airbnb. This was completely unexpected and we felt the staff at citizenM went above and beyond to make our stay there special seeing as it got off to such a bad start. It was expensive to stay there but we got what we paid for. The hotel was clean, modern and very cool with all the technical features. I love how the rooms are controlled by the MoodPad, lighting, curtains, television etc. I would definitely stay in another citizenM hotel because we absolutely loved it and we were blown away by the great customer service! CitizenM is such a cool hotel chain! We had a total of 2 nights in the citizenM Paris Gare de Lyon Hotel.

This was our 5th hotel from CitizenM chain and we werenât disappointed. Great location; sparkly clean smart room; cool living room ambience; delicious food and drinks; amazing staff: super friendly, helpful & attentive! Weâll definitely come back again!

This is a really nice hotel just round the corner from Gare de Lyon.
There are 12 floors of accommodation, all of which have the super-cool CitizenM smart room controls. The bed is really comfortable and the bathroom has a great shower.
The staff are really friendly.
The view from the 16th-floor bar is fantastic: you can see across all of Paris and have a stunning view of the sunset behind La DÃ©fense.
The breakfast has a huge variety and freshly-made coffee: exactly what you need to start the day.

My husband and I had a wonderful experience at the citizenM Paris Gare de Lyon.
From the friendly and helpful people at the front desk to housekeeping to the cafeteria staff, My stay was warm and very comfortable.

I was intrigued by their self checkin and checkout style. Their clean and compact smart rooms, the contemporary design of the hotel and the way every space in the hotel tells a different story.

Breakfast was really good, their cafeteria food is also really nice, I also love how take-out isnt restricted. Did I mention the lovely view of paris from my room or the beautiful view from the sky lounge on the 16th floor? Breath taking!

All in all, I had the best time in Paris and citizenM paris had a lot to do with that. Check them out guysððð¼

Absolutely amazing! I have stayed at a lot of different types of hotels around the world, but the experience at CitizenM was like none other. Very modern/high-tech, somewhat quirky design, staying at CitizenM was an experience in and of itself. Would highly recommend.

This is what happens when intelligence and style meet.   Compact rooms, though filled to perfection with a king bed and leading technologies.    Paris cool rooftop bar,  excellent 24hr cafe,  Modern Art everywhere, Happy people working for them.  A+

Great, modern with a friendly staff hotel. A true XXI century experience :) Breathtaking view over Paris from the Sky Bar!
A rail & metro station just 2 minutes walk from the hotel, getting to the centre doesn't take longer than 10 minutes with a train. 25 minutes walking distance to Notre Dame along the Seine.
Will definitely be back, once in Paris!

Very nice. Good location.
Modern decor, professional staff. Nice bar, but not cheap. Great views from the 16th floor.
Hi tech rooms, an iPad controls everything.
A nice touch: no adaptors needed for anybody (see picture).
Good value for money

Love citizenM concept which suits my travel lifestyle. More important the reception staff has been excellent. I stayed at both CDG and Gare Lyon location and ALL the reception staff have been excellent. Special shout out for Mercy and Isabelle ( Gare Lyon team) who help us when we check in and check out. Thank you citizenM.

Very modern & stylish with quirky art in common spaces.
Room was clean & very comfortable. Great shower.
Only issue was the door to the room needed a hefty shove to open.

The people are very fun and friendly.
The room are great! With (colour-) light you could regular by yourself. ð¤©
Crazy mercy is a very fun girl who made your stay great!
I had one of the best stays in France after a long time. Emma, Noor and Hannah made the whole experience really pleasant! CitizenM is now my go to hotel whenever I visit Paris.

Bit of a dodgier part of town (near train station is typically like that) but price was 1/2 that of the Champs ÃlysÃ©es one and perfect for arriving/leaving by train.  Some great restaurants around there that are not incredibly expensive as many might be.

Nice hotel with hight tech clean rooms. The ability to control the TV, blinds, and lighting in the room all with the provided iPad is very amazing and convient. The only thing to note is that it seems to be located in business area with mostly office buildings around so you will have to travel if you want to eat or shop. Still, it is a good hotel as it is within walking distance of metro station where you can easily travel to the famous locations in Paris.

We've stayed at a couple of CitizenM's and they're all wonderfull! So much luxury for a reasonable price. The soft beds en plush pillows are just sooo comfy. The staff is always incredibly friendly and the breakfast is super elaborate.

Newly constructed hotel in renovated building very close to Gare de Lyon. Friendly, helpful staff. Funky lounge and bar/restaurant areas. Guest lounge on the top floor is lovely too - and has great views over Paris.

Fantastic hotel. Clean, efficient, great amenities,  pleasant atmosphere . The staff is friendly, professional   and helpful with great suggestions. The location was perfect for getting around  Paris. I would definitely recommend this hotel for a very pleasant stay in Paris.
Very comfortable. Good service. Easy check-in. High tech rooms with fun tablet to play with. We were also able to leave our luggages there for the day, after checking out.

This place has exceeded my expectation! Had an amazing stay in this hotel with a great value for money. The photos in their website is what you will expect to see once you arrive.. clean, modern and comfy. I also like that it's very accesible to train station (5mind walk) and a bus stop (1min) so it's easy to go to anywhere in Paris. It is also close to some shops and the hotel has it's own bar in 1st flr and 16th flr (open until 1am) which is dope! Also, the coolest thing is, the Ipad..it controls almost everything in the room.. the mood lights, temperature, TV, curtains etc! The lounge area is also well styled and very spacious.
Only suggestion is that the hotel provide some  electric kettle and coffee/tea! Other than that, everything was superb! I will definitely come back to this place everytime I visit Paris!
reviews.ownerResponse: Hi Beverly, thanks for much for your awesome review and we could not jump higher of happiness hearing that we exceeded your expectations! Can you hear us celebrate? :) We are proud ourselves to hear that you embraced the concept and its offering and that technology made everything easy to control everything in the room, with only the touch of a finger. Thanks for your feedback about the tea/coffee facilities in the room. We always want to offer the best quality products, that's why we strongly believe in barista-made coffee and high-quality teas, which can be ordered 24/7 at our canteenM. Our ambassadors will be happy to make the coffee of your liking at any time. Hope to see you soon, citizenAlina

reviews.text: Amazing room and service for a great price! I love the theme of the hotel and the bed nook. The room controller was very fun to play with! Definitely plan to stay there again!

I was really in love with this Hotel and wish I could have stayed there for ever. The room can be controlled via an iPad which you have in the room. From different light options to Controlling the Mood lights and colours. U can control the Air conditioning temperature etc from it, switch the tv on and off and browse the channels and movies and local guides from the ipad.  Control the curtains and blinds to go up and down.  I would happily stay in one of the rooms as my home if could.
Check in was really easy u can do it from the reception. U also have access to the lounge and bars and the one at the very top has nice views of Paris.
They have access to PCs and if you are needing to print out tickets etc u have a printer available.
The shower was also amazing. I was never out of it.
I was really amazed by this hotel and would definitely stay in another CitizenM as my first choice.
Oh u get a really cute citizen M teddy / pillow that was soo cute which u have on ur bed when u arrive and is really cute and now i wish i got one to take home.....

Also it is right beside the Gare de Lyon station so u can get the tram or train to anywhere. We went to Disneyland Paris and just got the train and it was only Â£15 return and we also got the train to the airport and saved ourselves money on a taxi/uber.
This hotel is really in a great location and will make ur stay in Paris more enjoyable.
Excellent hotel near the Seine on walking distance from Gare de Lyon and le Marais. The staff is excellent and very friendly. Nice relaxing atmosphere and good bar on the 16th Floor. Recommended!
Good atmosphere, close to metro, high tech equipment, spacious rooms, and attentive staff made our stay here very worthwhile.

Best hotel staff EVER!  We travelled to Paris as a surprise for our daughter's birthday, and the staff truly went out of their way to make her weekend extra special!  I highly recommend CitizenM hotels, in general--but the Gare de Lyon staff went above and beyond with their hospitality.  The management and corporate leadership should certainly recognize how excellent their employees are!  We look forward to future stays at the Gare de Lyon CitizenM.

I'm a massive fan of the CitizenM chain. For a chain the hotels are really personal. Totally free movies as we as TV (inc. BBC1) and radio channels available. Rooms have a huge double bed, one of the comfiest beds I've slept in. Good soundproofing in the rooms also.

Found a trendy little mid priced hotel (â¬144 per night) 3min walk from Gare de Lyon.

ð³ð± Dutch brand: Quirky messages peppered through the place, max efficiency.

ð±IPad controlling the lighting (try the party mood: makes your bathroom change color!)

ð¤Checkin efficiency. No checkout time spent as there is no mini bar. Young and friendly staff

ð king size bed, great air conditioning, rain shower, fluffy towels, complimentary @evianwater

ð¼View on the river and the Eiffel Tower

ð¥âð³ yummy early breakfast with creamy scrambled eggs, delicious french bread, soy cappuccino and freshly pressed fruit juice
Fab hotel. Immaculately clean. Friendly helpful staff. Very relaxed vibe throughout the hotel.  Ideal location for Paris sight- seeing. Loved everything about the place

This is great hotel near Seine river and Lyon station. It is close to public transportation and there are several bars near Seine river. I got king room with city view. My room was at 14th floor and I was able to see Seine river, Les Invalides and  Eiffel Tower. Room number was 1401. Unfortunately windows are not clear and it is hindering the view. I paid total 110 USD daily amd it is a great price for the experience and view. Everything in room is automated and lights, curtains can be controlled from Iphone CitizenM application.

Modern, clean, and cozy hotel. The staff is super friendly. The property is located near metro stations. The location is great for getting around to all of the must sees in Paris. I highly recommend this joint.
Boutique hotel situated near gare de Lyon which is quite convenient. Service staff in the hotel are amazingly friendly and helpful. Location is not bad and certain rooms come with very nice view.

My Flat White Odyssey continues on the continent ðð¼ð«ð·ðð¼
The day is getting late and finally managed to find one worth taking the time to review ... third time lucky.
Great punch with lots of body balanced by the richness of the steamed milk (Great Job AndrÃ©)
Surprisingly it's at our hotel ... could have been a tricky one if the hotel sucked but fortunately citizenM also deserves a full 5 stars.
Fantastic vibe, inspirational decor and most importantly a glorious shower and the king size bed even more so!
PS - The Glasgow citizenM also perfectly compliments the glorious Glasgow vibe ðð¼

Free fast wifi at least 75 Mbps. Great bed and rain shower in the room. Free movies, including erotica movies, without paying any additional fees! Everything controlled via an iPad. Very friendly and sweet personel. Great spot to visit Paris center! Highly recommended!
