reviews.ownerResponse: Good hotel but food to avoid! The welcome is not worthy of a 4 star and on the contrary, we have the impression of having to deal with the McDonald's staff. The menu presented dishes all reheated...in short, it was disgusting. Ossobuco and prawn risotto. The worst ever eaten. The room is good, designer and modern but very small. Free hot movies... I will come back to sleep or work there but not to eat there! Passable mention for Michelina who was not up to par.

reviews.text: Je mets deux etoiles car le personnel Ã©tait vraiment charmant. But otherwise, very clean rooms, uncomfortable bed, the walls are made of cardboard so a lot of noise, and I'm not just talking about the tram. After the district, it's the 20th, La Villette, so take care of yourself and your belongings.

reviews.text: Une gestion de robots, des stagiaires gentils mais inexpÃ©rimentÃ©s comme seuls interlocuteurs, une cuisine de micro-onde, impossible de faire la moindre demande de surclassement, d'avoir des chambre rapprochÃ©es, d'en prolonger une, bref l'horreur futuriste.
reviews.ownerResponse: Management of robots, kind but inexperienced interns as the only contacts, a microwave kitchen, impossible to make the slightest request for an upgrade, to have close rooms, to extend one, in short, futuristic horror.

reviews.text: L'hÃ´tel est trÃ¨s confortable et le personnel aimable, mais la nourriture est si mauvaise que Ã§a m'a poussÃ© Ã  venir poster cet avis pendant mon repas. Franchement, Ã  Paris, c'est triste de manger aussi mÃ©diocrement.
reviews.ownerResponse: The hotel is very comfortable and the staff friendly, but the food is so bad that it made me come and post this review during my meal. Frankly, in Paris, it's sad to eat so poorly.

reviews.text: For trendy tourists. English-speaking staff with broken French. Despite the trendy decor with lots of technology, I didn't feel comfortable. A real hive of activity without a soul. The rooms are small, the bed is only accessible from one side. I won't be back; I prefer the Citizen hotel at the airport, even though it's out of the way.

reviews.text:
Bed against window facing a building in construction . Terrible when waking on a Monday with workers facing you despite scenic view displayed on reservation
Service provided by lovely young people who seem to strive as human robots . The place is not reflecting French or Parisian culture /living
The breakfast is not appropriate for healthy eating
The warm food especially is not consumable .
Despite been situated in a convenient place. Not recommended. Price does not reflect the bad or lack of quality

Nice location, but the staff gave a key to my room to another guest and barely apologized for it, this is a major safety issue, good thing I was in my room because what if I wasnt there and had my things stolen? This is a major safety issue. Also a staff member came knocking at my door at midnight saying âserviceâ and when I said I didnt need anything he kept knocking over and over again and I had to repeat myself, then he said I called for a pillow which was not true, felt very unsafe during this trip. There is a nice bar at the rooftop but the staff would rather talk to each other than serve guests
reviews.ownerResponse:
Dear Amel, 
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Iâm really sorry to hear that your stay didnât meet expectations, and I appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention.

The situation with another guest receiving a key to your room is a clear mistake on our part, and I completely understand your concerns. Weâve already reviewed our check-in procedures to make sure this doesnât happen again, and Iâm glad you were there to prevent anything from going wrong but it should never have happened in the first place.

Iâm also sorry for the late-night disturbance and any confusion that came with it. Thatâs not the kind of experience we want for our guests, and weâre following up with our team to ensure communication is clearer and more respectful going forward.

Regarding the rooftop bar, I appreciate your honest feedback. We want every guest to feel welcome and well taken care of, and your comments help us refocus on the level of service we aim to provide.

Thanks again for sharing your experience â it really helps us improve. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a much smoother and more enjoyable stay.

Emilie and the citizenM team

reviews.text: Room shades did not function, staff would not resolve and left a sleep mask. Poor customer service. Would recommend you keep looking if considering staying here.

They do not clean rooms between nights. You wake up from cleaning lady noises in the corridor. Sound insulation very bad. Bathroom and shower literally in the room and not separate. I had hair on the floor and some things btoken in the room.
Overpriced massively.
However, what disappointed me the most was that this hotel does not offer a fresh baguette for breakfast. Instead it is this fake frozen baguette that you can eat anywhere in the world and has nothing to do with fresh bread.

I will not return to this hotel. initially they charged us much more in the municipal tax despite the fact that we had made the reservation through booking. they told us that a mistake was made and that we have to pay a lot more without any support and help. the rooms were very small. they didn't clean for free. I wonder why it is four stars. they offer two-star facilities. really tragic.

I feel this hotel tries to hard to be âdifferentâ with their concept. It sounds cool, but nothing really works. The self-check in isnât self-check in. They say to go to the hotel for a possible early check-in yet they donât let you check-in or put your name in the queue if they arenât rooms available. They tell you the app will notify you when your room is available but thatâs not the case because you arenât âchecked-in.â If I didnât return to the hotel to check on my room, many people who came in after me would have taken my place.

Then thereâs the room being cleaned. The say you have the freedom to choose which days you want your room cleaned but have no control when they come. And when they do (one day it was at 11 and another day at 4p), they are aggressive if you arenât ready for them. Even the interactions with the cleaners in the hallways were uncomfortable and cold.

Yes the in-room technology was cool, but Iâm not going to return to a hotel just for that.  But I will say that everyone in the bar to the restaurant to the front desk (though not managed or runs smoothly) was extremely friendly.

Wouldnât return to this location or any citizenM hotel. There are too many options out there any this hotel tries to hard to be different, but itâs just not needed and makes it more difficult for the traveler.
No electricity or WiFi between 11:00 to 14:30 and the hotel is unwilling to even offer any compensation.

WARNING: Staff will steal your items. Do not stay in this hotel.

An item was stolen from our room by the cleaning staff. The management said it would be investigated and would compensate us if the investigation was not successful. Later, after the item was not found, they changed their mind and said that we should file a complaint with the police.

We have been staying at this hotel 2 months ago, they have destroyed our laundry which we gave for laundry service, we are going through reclamation process since 2 months and itâs terrible, everything was fine until we left the hotel, hotel manager assured that situation is going to be solved (in person!) when we were at the place. As soon as we left, hotel started ignoring our e-mails and is not responding. I have called 4 times by phone and Iâm never able to talk with manager. Seriously, if you wear pricey clothes, stay away from this hotel and laundry service! Itâs terrible and itâs going to end at police and in a court as simply we donât know whatâs going to happen next because nobody respond to us. What a terrible experience, I travel a lot and have never experienced something like this!!!

We had a good arrival and we told the concierge that our booking didnât appeared in the app, and he said, no problem, did the check-in in 2 minutes and thatâs it. we stayed two nights, the first  night the tv service wasnât working. The only response was: sorry we will pass your complain. The second night when we arrived the room was not clean, after complaining the response was that we had to requested via app, which we were not informed about. Trying to get a solution the lady concierge told me not to be so dramatic, a terrible answer to a disappointed guest. She brought fresh towels 20 minutes later and she literally said âheyâ handed me the towels turn around and left. Iâm very disappointed with the service and the way your staff dealt with the problem.

Terrible... you check yourself in, very expensive bar, staff that barely says hello.
Everything in the room works with the tablet... but the tablet doesn't work....
At the time of departure I ask for the invoice, they tell me that it will be sent to my email (which they don't have...) I insist but they don't care and they leave.

P.S. They try to imitate Mama Shelter but they don't even reach their ankle.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Hello citizen Davide,

Thank you for taking the time to write to us.
First of all our  sincerest apologies for the inconvenience you experienced.  We always strive to give the best services to our guests and we are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure we share the feedback with our staff  to ensure it does not happen again.
About your invoice, we have sent it by the email on your reservation and hope you it it soon.
We hope to see you again soon to change your expactations.

CitizenM PGL Team.

reviews.text: Racial profiling at it worst. A few incidents happened in the first day of arrival. Check-in was perfect. The staff at this area were friendly and professional. Everyone else really needs to be trained in basics on how not to be a racist. Went to breakfast and whilst everyone else was not asked for their details upon entering the (not very good) buffet I was asked to stop taking food until they could verify I was staying at the hotel. After this experience I chose to order my lunch from Deliveroo instead. I went to the outdoor atrium to smoke. I was carry my food but was not going to eat it there given the mornings unwelcoming experience. I was then accosted by a staff member (also blonde Caucasian as per the mornings staff member) and told I could not eat here with the food from outside. I said I understood I was just going to have a smoke. She said it again. And again I said I am just going to have a smoke. As I say there she just stood by and stared at me the whole time until I left. Then she followed me to the lifts. Then disappeared. This is terrible unwelcoming experience. I have stayed at Citizen M hotels in many parts of the world and this is absolutely a terrible experience. I am here for the next 4 days for business and am dreading every minute of it. A few bad apples can really spoil it for everyone. They really need to train their staff on racial bias behavior.

More like a 1 STAR property with a very poor guest experience. It felt like staying in a hostel vs. a 4 star property.
Cons:
1) Of the 4 nights we stayed, bedsheets weren't changed 3 nights in a row until we had to call the reception and complain
2) No room service
3) Shampoo/body wash wasn't refilled even after putting a written note on the empty bottle of shampoo/body wash
4) Electric sockets didn't work and I had to get an additional adaptor from the hotel for which I was asked to make a deposit of 30â¬
5) This property isn't close to anything in particular for business (an hour from the conference center in Paris) and landmarks
6) The staff was NOT HELPFUL at all and just acted helpless and kept saying sorry without any solution at 4 different occasions
7) They seem to have a self check-in experience but when we couldn't check-in and there was nobody in sight for almost 15 mins at the front desk to assist
8) No iron and ironing board in the room which is a big downside for anyone staying for business

Pros:
They have a smart home/room system in place where you can control the lights and tv with an iPad but seemed pretty unimportant when you can't get the basic areas of hotel/guest/hospitality experience right.
reviews.ownerResponse: Hi there citizen Nikita! Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your stay with us was not up to standard. citizenM was designed to be different and to say goodbye to traditional hotel concepts. By cutting out the unnecessary, and focusing on what we consider to be the essentials, we are able to offer you affordable luxury. That's why you have the iron heaven (room with ironing board), and it's the reason why we don't offer room service but we keep our canteen open 24/7. You can also order food delivery, just remember to include your room number in the order, so our ambassadors know where to direct it. We have shared your feedback with our teams and the housekeeping team as well. We are open to all feedback so we can improve ourselves. Hopefully you will give us a second chance, citizen Dagmar

reviews.text: We stayed here and the rooms were fine. However, we left a personal item in the room. No fault but our own but when we called the hotel minutes after we left, they said they would have the hotel staff grab it so we could get it back. We called back the following day and now they âcanât locate itâ even though it was right on the desk in plain sight. Then the woman proceeded to tell me that most likely it was thrown away. Her story changed over a course of 5 minutes. Just a word of advice for anyone staying here, make sure to take EVERYTHING before leaving. If you donât, most likely you will never see it again, especially if itâs valuable. Very rude and dishonest staff.

Donât stay here.
Poor discriminatory service at the lobby.

No service dogs allowed in the lobby? Because people may be allergic. But i bet the hotel serves peanuts and other foods people may be allergic to.

What a joke!

- very old and cheap towels quality, we received twice torned towels.
- no hot water in the shower for 10 hours during the day not night time.
- friendly staff.

Apologies for the exceptional situation that occur for the first time and I can assure you we did our very best to solve it.

Manon

reviews.text: I had an accident infront of the hotel. I asked their help whether I could wash my hands and the wounded partsâ¦the hotel reception refused to give me any help saying that the toilet is reserved only for hotel guestsâ¦Zero empathyâ¦shame on you.

Disappointing @citizenM are not allowing guests to reschedule bookings to other dates if they cannot fly due to adverse weather conditions. My flight is cancelled but they won't accommodate a booking date amendment. I will be using a more customer friendly hotel chain in future.

Double charged, refunded of only 10% of the second billing. Abusive, not professional. And I did confirm to the receptionist I did pay before online. She didnât check, made me pay again saying worst case Iâd be refunded. Well I was not. (Do not take the Â«Â viewÂ Â» itâs a con)

Credit card was skimmed in this hotel by a hotel employee. When I notified the manager, he told me that could and would never happen. Totally dismissed the whole incident. Be carefull here, had to cancel my card, you will be stolen from, check your balances hourly if you ise a credit card here...
The rooms are so small! A rabbit cage! The location is also very bad. Avoid this hotel, there is so many better places in Paris

very bad experience in this hotel, although the price is a bit high, night staff at the beginning show low respect and prevent my check-in, i had to find another hotel at midnight then, i believe this shouldn't happen in this world!
Poor service Saturday night at 11pm waiting 20 minutes for a drink then told by the girl behind the bar go upstairs to the other bar total bad attitude niver stay in the hotel again.
Scammed my credit card even tho I cancelled the stay 48hrs prior, this hotel should be reported to the authorities.
No TV signal.  Did not fix it after notice. Very weird noise in the morning.
Just appalling and the beds were uncomfortable

Dear citizen
We are surprised by your comment. Do not hesitate to share with you any experiences you add in our hotel. We are eager to take care of people and a person is always available to have a conversation and understand anything which can happen. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any information to share. Have a nice and safe day.
A.
Assistant Hotel Manager.

Hello, I sent this message to customer service and received an automatic message without any link to my request. I have no answer to date. L Here is my original message:
Hello, we stayed in the hotel the night of September 27-28
in room 1410. This morning at 9 a.m. it was impossible to leave the room
because of the lock which was blocked! We attempted twice to
contact reception from the room, we remained on hold
for more than 10 minutes. So I had to call from my cell phone to
the hotel, I had the first person to whom I explained the problem
giving my room number. Then the communication was cut off.
I waited 5 minutes for someone to call me back to my room which is never
arrived! So I called a second time, I got a person who
didn't speak a word of French! For a hotel located in Paris it is
Still a shame! Especially since this person asked me to call back
in 1 hour to have someone who speaks French. So I gave him
explained the problem in English! I was put on hold again,
then after 10 minutes, he told me he was sending someone. By dint of
force on the lock we managed to unlock it ourselves
moment when a young girl arrived to see what was happening!
As a result we missed our train which left at 9:42 a.m. We had to
take the next one which cost us the modest sum of â¬303!!!
I'm not even talking about security! There would have been a fire
in the hotel we could not leave the room!!! I find
this is simply unacceptable!!!

Hello Sandrine, 

Thank you for your comments. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations, particularly due to the cold in the room. Despite our efforts to manage the situation, we understand that it was not enough and offer our sincere apologies.

Regarding the layout of the rooms, it is an integral part of our modern and connected concept. However, we will take note of your comments to improve your comfort. Finally, the tourist tax is set by the city of Paris, and not by our establishment.

reviews.text: Lavoro nel settore del marketing, ma sono caduto anche io nella trappola fotografica. Sono scappato dopo la prima notte, e nessuno al check out mi ha consigliato sulle possibilitÃ  di un eventuale rimborso per le restanti 3 notti. Unica cosa positiva il personale della struttura, simpatico e gentile. Le 4 stelle su Booking e Google non hanno alcun fondamento, il CitizenM dovrebbe essere declassato   notevolmente. reviews.ownerResponse: I work in the marketing industry, but I also fell into the camera trap. The images are misleading, the rooms are tiny and without the possibility of opening the windows even partially. I ran away after the first night, and no one at check out advised me on the possibilities of a possible refund for the remaining 3 nights. The only positive thing is the staff of the structure, friendly and kind. The 4 stars on Booking and Google have no basis, the CitizenM should be significantly downgraded. If you suffer from closed places, this hotel should be avoided like the plague. I'm sorry to give a bad review of a facility, but we need to protect consumers' rights from fake reviews.

reviews.ownerResponse:
The hotel is very well located. That's all said.
The rooms are really too small without a separate bathroom, you have to clear your tray after the meal and the staff looks more like club med entertainers.
If you like the colorful spirit while paying for 4 stars, why not.
On the other hand, it becomes more problematic when you are charged twice for your stay.
In fact, I was assured that the payment entered online was a deposit and that I would have to pay again at check-in. Let's admit. Result, 2 days later I was charged twice for the stay.
To reach them by phone, it took me several attempts and a lot of waiting.
By WhatsApp, several attempts too and unconvincing answers.
Oh yes, if you don't speak English, I advise you not to because, although in France it is English that is worth...
In short, a priori the problem is being resolved. To be continued.
To summarize, everything is done cool... maybe a little too much for the price!

- Dans les chambres, c'est pratique puisque tout (absolument tout, lumiÃ¨re, volet, tempÃ©rature,...) est commandable par tablette. Sauf que... c'est la troisiÃ¨me fois de suite que cette tablette est cassÃ©e ou non rechargeable. J'ai appelÃ© la rÃ©ception qui a fait son maximum et 5' plus tard m'a rappelÃ© pour me dire qu'il pouvait me donner une autre tablette mais qu'il fallait que je descende la rÃ©cupÃ©rer ! Bref, CitizenM gare de Lyon avait beaucoup d'atouts mais sans une maintenance sÃ©rieuse et quotidienne, il (et surtout les voyageurs) souffre d'une dÃ©crÃ©pitude inacceptable, contre laquelle l'ensemble du personnel - au demeurant sympathique- ne peut pas lutter.
reviews.ownerResponse:
I regularly come to this hotel, whose location and check-in facilities are undeniable assets. But this will be the last time. This hotel is undergoing a rapid decline, including the following examples:
- In the rooms, it's convenient since everything (absolutely everything: lights, shutters, temperature, etc.) can be controlled by a tablet. Except... this is the third time in a row that this tablet has been broken or not rechargeable. The two previous times, certain functions no longer worked (like turning on the TV, for example). Yesterday, it was... everything. The tablet was broken. The temperature was set too low, making it impossible to change it. I called reception, who did their best and 5 minutes later called me back to tell me they could give me another tablet, but I had to go downstairs to get it! (At 11 p.m. in your underwear is convenient.) There are therefore insufficient staff to provide a minimum level of service... (with a room costing â¬240 a night...)
- Bad odors are often present in the rooms, especially around the sinks
- Very questionable cleanliness of the restrooms
- Several broken or damaged items: yesterday it was the heavily stained and scratched floor, or the telephone that no longer stayed on its stand
In short, CitizenM Gare de Lyon had many advantages, but without serious, daily maintenance, it (and especially the passengers) suffers from unacceptable decrepitude, which the entire staffâwho are otherwise friendlyâcannot combat.

reviews.text:
Alors que dire de ce concept d'hÃ´tel moderne 4 Ã©toiles avec mon Ã©pouse...
Tant de choses !
L'esprit de l'hÃ´tellerie est complÃ¨tement revu car le concept est diffÃ©rent et moderne. La rÃ©alitÃ© est tout autre : on coupe dans la masse salariale, on se revendique 4 Ã©toiles alors que la prestation globale laisse Ã  dÃ©sirer...
Exemples :
- faites vous mÃªme vos check-in et check-out. Un employÃ© du bar vise vos actions et vous guide dans un franÃ§ais approximatif : pas de rÃ©ception !
- Petite chambre Ã  l'aspect moderne ok mais le lit contre la fenÃªtre, un coin sanitaire douche et WC posÃ© lÃ  oÃ¹ vos bruits sont amplifiÃ©s pour la personne accompagnante, un lavabo trÃ¨s design mais trÃ¨s petit, directement dans la chambre et une tablette qui gÃ¨re tout, domotique pas trop rÃ©ussi car ne fonctionne pas parfaitement.
- Si vous omettez de demander de faire votre chambre le lendemain sur votre votre tablette, personne ne passe : combien de personnes comme nous, ne le savaient pas car on vous le dit pas. Encore lÃ  Ã©conomie personnel de nettoyage !
- Un petit dÃ©jeuner oÃ¹ le moindre euro est chassÃ© : plateau sachet un croissant et un bout de pain, je le rappelle pour un 4 Ã©toiles (le covid a bon dos)!
- J'avais juste l'impression d'Ãªtre dans un hÃ´tel Ã  Londres, tout est en anglais ou presque...

Conclusion une vÃ©ritable pompe Ã  fric car plus de 16 Ã©tages avec plus de 30 chambres par Ã©tage et Ã  tout casser mÃªme pas une dizaine d'employÃ©s pour essayer de gÃ©rer
PremiÃ¨re et derniÃ¨re fois que nous y mettons les pieds avec mon Ã©pouse, FUYEZ si comme nous, vous apprÃ©ciez le charme et l'accueil d'un Ã©tablissement oÃ¹ l'humain a son importance.
reviews.ownerResponse:
So what can I say about this modern 4-star hotel concept with my wife...
So many things!
The spirit of the hotel industry has been completely redesigned because the concept is different and modern. The reality is quite different: we cut payroll, we claim to be 4-star while the overall service leaves something to be desired...
Examples:
- Check in and check out yourself. A bar staff member monitors your actions and guides you in broken French: no reception!
- Small, modern-looking room, okay, but the bed is by the window, a shower and toilet area placed where your noises are amplified for the person accompanying you, a very stylish but very small sink, directly in the room, and a tablet that controls everything. Home automation isn't very successful because it doesn't work perfectly.
- If you forget to ask for your room to be cleaned the next day on your tablet, no one comes by: how many people like us didn't know because they didn't tell you. Again, saving on cleaning staff! - A breakfast where every last euro is wasted: a tray with a bag, a croissant, and a piece of bread. I'm reminding you of this for a 4-star hotel (COVID is a convenient excuse)!
- I just felt like I was in a London hotel, almost everything is in English...

Conclusion: a real money pit, with more than 16 floors with more than 30 rooms per floor, and at most, not even a dozen employees to try to manage.
First and last time my wife and I set foot there. RUN AWAY if, like us, you appreciate the charm and welcome of an establishment where people are important.

reviews.ownerResponse:
Since 2015, I've been coming to Citizen Charles de Gaulle up to 3 times a year. This time it was a horror trip!!!!!! Shameful, it's a 4-star hotel, all cybernetic. I'm logged in on the hotel site, so they have my credit card.... I arrived Sunday 24 hours, Monday I returned to the hotel, then an exhausting day. I entered the hotel, room 17 unmade!!! I protested, they told me that now they have to request cleaning via tablet. I do it for my entire stay in Paris. Tuesday I returned to the hotel, same time, room not made up, no towels changed... Wednesday, same thing, Thursday. After saying I WON'T RETURN AGAIN, they sent a sorry to make the room! 4:30 pm with me inside. Advice if you want to have a relaxing stay and enjoy Paris, look for another hotel!

I always felt at home.

Hello Cristelle,

I'm sorry to hear that your stay didn't meet your expectations. CitizenM rooms are quite different from traditional hotels, as is the concept itself. That's why we believe it's important to do your research beforehand and see if it matches your own needs and preferences. To help our readers make the right choice for their trip, we want to be as transparent as possible.

CitizenM rooms are approximately 14 square meters with a giant built-in bed. Our room design focused primarily on meeting basic needs and facilitating a good night's sleep. For a complete CitizenM experience, we invite our guests to enjoy the living rooms, like an extension of their room, to relax, work, or meet friends.

Hoping this will be useful to you in the future, I wish you a wonderful week.
Maria & the CitizenM team
